response.body:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:v8="http://service.twint.ch/header/types/v8_6" xmlns:v81="http://service.twint.ch/merchant/types/v8_6" xmlns:v82="http://service.twint.ch/base/types/v8_6">
    <soapenv:Header>
        <v8:ResponseHeaderElement>
            <v8:MessageId>{{randomValue type='UUID'}}</v8:MessageId>
        </v8:ResponseHeaderElement>
    </soapenv:Header>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <v81:MonitorFastCheckoutCheckInResponseElement>
            <v81:CheckInNotification>
            <v81:MerchantInformation>
                <v82:MerchantUuid>{{xPath request.body '//MonitorFastCheckoutCheckInRequestElement/MerchantUuid/text()[1]'}}</v82:MerchantUuid>
                <v82:CashRegisterId>{{xPath request.body '//MonitorFastCheckoutCheckInRequestElement/CashRegisterId/text()[1]'}}</v82:CashRegisterId>
            </v81:MerchantInformation>
            <v81:PairingUuid>{{xPath request.body '//MonitorFastCheckoutCheckInRequestElement/PairingUuid/text()[1]'}}</v81:PairingUuid>
            <v81:PairingStatus>PAIRING_ACTIVE</v81:PairingStatus>
            </v81:CheckInNotification>
            <v81:ShippingMethodId>{{randomValue length=1 type='NUMERIC'}}</v81:ShippingMethodId>
            <v81:CustomerData>
                <v81:Field>
                    <v81:Name>shipping_address</v81:Name>
                    <v81:Value>John Doe, Rue de l'Écuyer 23A, 8004 Zürich, Switzerland</v81:Value>
                </v81:Field>
                <v81:Field>
                    <v81:Name>date_of_birth</v81:Name>
                    <v81:Value>13/12/1998</v81:Value>
                </v81:Field>
                <v81:Field>
                    <v81:Name>phone_number</v81:Name>
                    <v81:Value>+41791234567</v81:Value>
                </v81:Field>
                <v81:Field>
                    <v81:Name>email</v81:Name>
                    <v81:Value>max.mustermann@twint.swiss</v81:Value>
                </v81:Field>
            </v81:CustomerData>
        </v81:MonitorFastCheckoutCheckInResponseElement>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:v8="http://service.twint.ch/header/types/v8_6" xmlns:v81="http://service.twint.ch/merchant/types/v8_6" xmlns:v82="http://service.twint.ch/base/types/v8_6">
    <soapenv:Header>
        <v8:ResponseHeaderElement>
            <v8:MessageId>{{randomValue type='UUID'}}</v8:MessageId>
        </v8:ResponseHeaderElement>
    </soapenv:Header>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <v81:RequestFastCheckoutCheckInResponseElement>
            <v81:CheckInNotification>
            <v81:MerchantInformation>
                <v82:MerchantUuid>{{xPath request.body '//RequestCheckInRequestElement/MerchantUuid/text()[1]'}}</v82:MerchantUuid>
                <v82:CashRegisterId>{{xPath request.body '//RequestCheckInRequestElement/CashRegisterId/text()[1]'}}</v82:CashRegisterId>
            </v81:MerchantInformation>
            <v81:PairingUuid>{{randomValue type='UUID'}}</v81:PairingUuid>
            <v81:PairingStatus>PAIRING_IN_PROGRESS</v81:PairingStatus>
            </v81:CheckInNotification>
            <v81:Token>
                <v82:DisplayToken>{{randomValue length=5 type='NUMERIC'}}</v82:DisplayToken>
                <v82:APIToken>{{randomValue type='UUID'}}</v82:APIToken>
                <v82:QRCodeImage>data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAB0AAAAdAQAAAAB+6FqiAAAAcElEQVR4XmP4////DwY04oP4gQqG7zfjKxi+RFwEEiGBQCIYSHy/cr+C4YOoQwXD/2/1Pxi+uzQDxfJyfjB8ZTtSwfBp6aQfDJ8DZYGmfJQBqhO2Aiq5k/WD4UsAUPZLXBaQiDkIFLs/BWQHUAkWywHxKVTo7R9lFgAAAABJRU5ErkJggg==</v82:QRCodeImage>
            </v81:Token>
            <v81:QRCode>data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAB0AAAAdAQAAAAB+6FqiAAAAcElEQVR4XmP4////DwY04oP4gQqG7zfjKxi+RFwEEiGBQCIYSHy/cr+C4YOoQwXD/2/1Pxi+uzQDxfJyfjB8ZTtSwfBp6aQfDJ8DZYGmfJQBqhO2Aiq5k/WD4UsAUPZLXBaQiDkIFLs/BWQHUAkWywHxKVTo7R9lFgAAAABJRU5ErkJggg==</v81:QRCode>
        </v81:RequestFastCheckoutCheckInResponseElement>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:v8="http://service.twint.ch/header/types/v8_5" xmlns:v81="http://service.twint.ch/merchant/types/v8_5" xmlns:v82="http://service.twint.ch/base/types/v8_5">

            </v81:MerchantInformation>

            <v81:QRCode>data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAB0AAAAdAQAAAAB+6FqiAAAAcElEQVR4XmP4////DwY04oP4gQqG7zfjKxi+RFwEEiGBQCIYSHy/cr+C4YOoQwXD/2/1Pxi+uzQDxfJyfjB8ZTtSwfBp6aQfDJ8DZYGmfJQBqhO2Aiq5k/WD4UsAUPZLXBaQiDkIFLs/BWQHUAkWywHxKVTo7R9lFgAAAABJRU5ErkJggg==</v81:QRCode>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:v8="http://service.twint.ch/header/types/v8_5" xmlns:v81="http://service.twint.ch/merchant/types/v8_5" xmlns:v82="http://service.twint.ch/base/types/v8_5">
    <soapenv:Header>
        <v8:ResponseHeaderElement>
            <v8:MessageId>{{randomValue type='UUID'}}</v8:MessageId>
        </v8:ResponseHeaderElement>
    </soapenv:Header>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <v81:ConfirmOrderResponseElement>
            <v81:MerchantInformation>
                <v82:MerchantUuid>{{xPath request.body '//MonitorOrderRequestElement/MerchantUuid/text()[1]'}}</v82:MerchantUuid>
                <v82:CashRegisterId>{{xPath request.body '//MonitorOrderRequestElement/CashRegisterId/text()[1]'}}</v82:CashRegisterId>
            </v81:MerchantInformation>
            <v81:Order type="PAYMENT_IMMEDIATE" confirmationNeeded="false">
                <v81:PostingType>GOODS</v81:PostingType>
                <v81:RequestedAmount>
                    <v82:Amount>195</v82:Amount>
                    <v82:Currency>CHF</v82:Currency>
                </v81:RequestedAmount>
                {{#assign 'clientMerchantTransactionReference'}}{{xPath request.body '//ConfirmOrderRequestElement/MerchantTransactionReference/text()[1]'}}{{/assign}}
                {{#assign 'randomMerchantTransactionReference'}}{{randomInt}}{{/assign}}
                <v81:MerchantTransactionReference>{{defaultIfEmpty clientMerchantTransactionReference randomMerchantTransactionReference}}</v81:MerchantTransactionReference>
                <v81:PaymentAuthorizationType>FINAL_AUTH</v81:PaymentAuthorizationType>
                {{#assign 'clientOrderUuid'}}{{xPath request.body '//ConfirmOrderRequestElement/OrderUuid/text()[1]'}}{{/assign}}
                {{#assign 'randomOrderUuid'}}{{randomValue type='UUID'}}{{/assign}}
                <v81:Uuid>{{defaultIfEmpty clientOrderUuid randomOrderUuid}}</v81:Uuid>
                <v81:Status>
                    <v81:Status code="0">SUCCESS</v81:Status>
                    <v81:Reason code="0">ORDER_OK</v81:Reason>
                </v81:Status>
                <v81:CreationTimestamp>{{now}}</v81:CreationTimestamp>
                <v81:AuthorizedAmount>
                    <v82:Amount>195</v82:Amount>
                    <v82:Currency>CHF</v82:Currency>
                </v81:AuthorizedAmount>
                <v81:PaymentAmount>
                    <v81:PaymentMethod>DEBIT</v81:PaymentMethod>
                    <v81:Amount>
                        <v82:Amount>195</v82:Amount>
                        <v82:Currency>CHF</v82:Currency>
                    </v81:Amount>
                </v81:PaymentAmount>
            </v81:Order>
            <v81:PairingStatus>PAIRING_ACTIVE</v81:PairingStatus>
        </v81:ConfirmOrderResponseElement>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:v8="http://service.twint.ch/header/types/v8_5" xmlns:v81="http://service.twint.ch/merchant/types/v8_5" xmlns:v82="http://service.twint.ch/base/types/v8_5">

                <v81:PaymentAmount>

            <v81:PairingStatus>PAIRING_ACTIVE</v81:PairingStatus>

    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

                <v81:Status>

                    <v81:Reason code="90">ORDER_PENDING</v81:Reason>
                </v81:Status>
                <v81:CreationTimestamp>{{now}}</v81:CreationTimestamp>
                <v81:AuthorizedAmount>
                    <v82:Amount>195</v82:Amount>
                    <v82:Currency>CHF</v82:Currency>
                </v81:AuthorizedAmount>
                <v81:PaymentAmount>
                    <v81:PaymentMethod>DEBIT</v81:PaymentMethod>
                    <v81:Amount>
                        <v82:Amount>195</v82:Amount>
                        <v82:Currency>CHF</v82:Currency>
                    </v81:Amount>
                </v81:PaymentAmount>
            </v81:Order>
            <v81:PairingStatus>PAIRING_ACTIVE</v81:PairingStatus>
        </v81:MonitorOrderResponseElement>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:v8="http://service.twint.ch/header/types/v8_5" xmlns:v81="http://service.twint.ch/merchant/types/v8_5" xmlns:v82="http://service.twint.ch/base/types/v8_5">
    <soapenv:Header>
        <v8:ResponseHeaderElement>
            <v8:MessageId>{{randomValue type='UUID'}}</v8:MessageId>
        </v8:ResponseHeaderElement>
    </soapenv:Header>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <v81:CancelOrderResponseElement>
            <v81:Order type="PAYMENT_IMMEDIATE" confirmationNeeded="false">
                <v81:PostingType>GOODS</v81:PostingType>
                <v81:RequestedAmount>
                    <v82:Amount>195</v82:Amount>
                    <v82:Currency>CHF</v82:Currency>
                </v81:RequestedAmount>
                <v81:MerchantTransactionReference>111222</v81:MerchantTransactionReference>
                <v81:Uuid>{{xPath request.body '//CancelOrderRequestElement/OrderUuid/text()[1]'}}</v81:Uuid>
                <v81:Status>
                    <v81:Status code="2">FAILURE</v81:Status>
                    <v81:Reason code="102">MERCHANT_ABORT</v81:Reason>
                </v81:Status>
                <v81:CreationTimestamp>{{now}}</v81:CreationTimestamp>
                <!--1 or more repetitions:-->
                <v81:PaymentAmount>
                    <v81:PaymentMethod>DEBIT</v81:PaymentMethod>
                    <v81:Amount>
                        <v82:Amount>195</v82:Amount>
                        <v82:Currency>CHF</v82:Currency>
                    </v81:Amount>
                </v81:PaymentAmount>
            </v81:Order>
        </v81:CancelOrderResponseElement>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>
